bug.summary: Creating new/Updating text area getting DuplicateWidgetID error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I'm trying to update a text area with new text by creating a placeholder and calling the placeholder.text_area() in a loop, this gives me the following error: **DuplicateWidgetID: There are multiple identical st.text_area widgets with the same generated key. (When a widget is created, it's assigned an internal key based on its structure. Multiple widgets with an identical structure will result in the same internal key, which causes this error.)** It seems to work in 1 for loop and fail in the other, not sure why. Is there any other way to update text in text area control? <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.51 Python version: 3.6.7 Using Conda? Yes OS version: Ubuntu 18.04 Browser version:
